Hey Tim.... If you're serious about upgrading your computer to make streams better quality and easier then I'd urge you to look at the Blackmagic television studio HD and something like a streamdeck before you do buy anything - That way you're offloading all of the switching and encoding onto a system that's designed specifically for that workload instead of using a software solution - It'll also work well with your BM camera :)

Also, I don't know if your Mac is wired through gigabit LAN to your modem/router? if you're just using WIFI then you might run into a bottleneck when watching a livestream and also sending one out at the same time.
